boardgame.name: Posthuman
boardgame.description: Our aspiration to omnipotence has led to the enhancement of our capacities so far beyond our species' limits that we created our genetic successors. Inevitably, the evolved reached their first realization as a unified entity: the extinction of humanity as we know it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Posthuman pits you as one of the last human survivors in a world where nature is reclaiming the planet and our evolved offspring are working to eradicate us. Will you resist mutation and survive, or give in to the inevitable and join the evolved?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the game, players are humans on a solitary journey to a promised safe house. This journey takes them through ten zones, with the zones being tile-based and randomly generated. As they travel, they encounter each other, other humans, and posthuman mutants. Encounters with mutants may inflict scars, and the more scars players have, the less human they are and the more posthuman they become. Will they strive to cling to their humanity and make a run for the safe house, winning the game? Or will they give in to the ever more tempting mutation, join the posthuman, and deny the win from the rest of the humans?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Kommt aus einem tierlosen Nichtraucherhaushalt! Angegebener Preis zzgl. Versandkosten. Bezahlung per Überweisung oder bar bei Abholung in Dresden. Only played once. #General: All of my games come from a passionate boardgaming household with no pets and no smoking Usually they are packed with sorting boxes and zip bags to ease and shorten ahe setup and break down time I only ship insured! #Versand nach Deutschland (Post/DHL, alle Preise in Euro): Paket (bis 2,0 kg): 5 € Paket (bis 10,0 kg): 6 € Paket (bis 20,0 kg): 11 € Paket (bis 31,5 kg): 13 € Bis 500 € versichert #International Shipping (DHL, all prices in Euro):: Parcel (up to 2,0 kg): 15 € (only EU) --_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; insured up to 500 € Parcel (up to 5,0 kg): 17 € (EU) or 30 € (Rest of Europe) or 35 € (USA/CAN) oder 45 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 10,0 kg): 22 € (EU) or 35 € (Rest of Europe) or 50 € (USA/CAN) oder 60 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 20,0 kg): 32 € (EU) or 50 € (Rest of Europe) or 70 € (USA/CAN) oder 95 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 31,5 kg): 42 € (EU) or 55 € (Rest of Europe) or 95 € (USA/CAN) oder 125 € (Rest of World) Insured up to 500,00 € worldwide NO ADDITIONAL FEES FOR PACKAGE AND WRAPPING! #Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Since October 2011 PP-fees are 0,35 Euro + (from 3,9% to 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. Paypal does not allow uninsured shipment above 25 Euro or shipments to any other address than the one submitted with the payment. Thank you Daniel
